name: Save new QuickBooks customers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new customer is created in QuickBooks, Make will automatically add that customer's info to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet]( https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e0Tl8oaEQ8YF4HB-kJqu59vpfBocQqGg55gmxfweiBI/edit#gid=0/xxx)
